<h3 id="X15172">X(15172)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(1)X(30)&cap;X(5)X(497)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp;  2*a^4-(b^2+8*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^ 2-c^2)^2 : :
<b><br>
X(15172) = X(1)+3*X(3058) = 7*X(1)-3*X(5434) = 3*X(1)+X(6284) = 5*X(1)-X(7354) = 9*X(1)-X(10483) = X(145)+3*X(11113) = 7*X(3058)+X(5434) = 9*X(3058)-X(6284) = 15*X(3058)+X(7354) = 9*X(5434)+7*X(6284) = 15*X(5434)-7*X(7354) = 27*X(5434)-7*X(10483) = 5*X(6284)+3*X(7354) = 3*X(6284)+X(10483) = 9*X(7354)-5*X(10483)
</b>
<p>
See Antreas Hatzipolakis and César Lozada, <a href="http://www.hyacinthos.epizy.com/message.php?msg=26753"> <b>Hyacinthos 26753.</b></a>
</p>
<p>
X(15172) lies on these lines:
{1, 30}, {3, 390}, {4, 6767}, {5, 497}, {11, 3628}, {12, 3850}, {20, 7373}, {35, 3530}, {55, 140}, {56, 548}, {145, 11113}, {149, 442}, {382, 1056}, {388, 3627}, {495, 546}, {498, 547}, {516, 5045}, {517, 6738}, {519, 3988}, {528, 1125}, {529, 3635}, {549, 3086}, {550, 999}, {612, 10128}, {614, 7734}, {632, 5218}, {938, 12702}, {942, 10624}, {946, 5719}, {950, 952}, {971, 15006}, {1000, 12645}, {1012, 10806}, {1385, 4314}, {1387, 2646}, {1478, 3853}, {1482, 3488}, {1483, 3486}, {1621, 6675}, {1656, 5274}, {1657, 3600}, {1697, 5690}, {1870, 13488}, {2241, 5305}, {2829, 13607}, {3149, 10596}, {3159, 9053}, {3304, 4302}, {3434, 8728}, {3487, 8236}, {3526, 5281}, {3579, 11019}, {3582, 11812}, {3583, 3861}, {3584, 7173}, {3585, 12102}, {3601, 11373}, {3614, 11737}, {3622, 11112}, {3623, 11114}, {3695, 4514}, {3748, 12047}, {3813, 5248}, {3816, 8715}, {3820, 3913}, {3843, 5261}, {3845, 5225}, {3851, 8164}, {3858, 10590}, {3859, 9671}, {3871, 4187}, {4292, 5049}, {4313, 10246}, {4366, 7819}, {4421, 10200}, {4995, 10124}, {5044, 5853}, {5066, 10056}, {5082, 11108}, {5217, 10072}, {5268, 13361}, {5298, 14891}, {5433, 12108}, {5708, 6361}, {5842, 13464}, {5843, 14100}, {5887, 9848}, {5901, 12053}, {5919, 10572}, {6198, 6756}, {6253, 11522}, {6283, 13081}, {6405, 13082}, {6922, 10679}, {6928, 12000}, {6987, 8158}, {7191, 10691}, {7330, 10384}, {7491, 10247}, {7525, 10832}, {7553, 9642}, {7743, 13411}, {7951, 12811}, {7956, 11500}, {8162, 12953}, {8727, 12116}, {9614, 10389}, {9955, 13405}, {10039, 12019}, {10046, 12106}, {10198, 11235}, {11237, 14893}, {11276, 14799}, {12915, 13369}
</p>
<p>
X(15172) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {942, 10624}, {950, 9957}<br>
X(15172) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 12699, 6147), (3, 390, 10386), (55, 496, 140), (388, 9668, 3627), (390, 1058, 3), (495, 1479, 546), (497, 3085, 9669), (497, 3295, 5), (498, 10593, 547), (498, 11238, 10593), (999, 4294, 550), (1479, 3303, 495), (3085, 9669, 5), (3295, 9669, 3085), (3488, 9785, 1482)
</p>
